data.enText: to continue trying to do or achieve sth despite difficulties

data.chText: 虽屡遭挫折，他们仍不断尝试乘气球环游世界。
data.enText: Despite a number of setbacks, they persevered in their attempts to fly around the world in a balloon.

data.chText: 她孜孜不倦地学习小提琴。
data.enText: She persevered with her violin lessons.

data.chText: 对难教的学生你必须坚持诲人不倦的精神。
data.enText: You have to persevere with difficult students.

example: he persisted to call me every night
The child persisted and kept asking questions

value.def: If you persevere with something, you keep trying to do it and do not give up, even though it is difficult.

example.ex: ...his ability to persevere despite obstacles and setbacks.
example.tran: 他锲而不舍、百折不挠的劲头儿

example.ex: ...a school with a reputation for persevering with difficult and disruptive children...
example.tran: 因对捣乱难管的学生不离不弃而闻名的学校

example.ex: She persevered in her idea despite obvious objections raised by friends.
example.tran: 虽然朋友们明确反对,她还是坚持己见。

example.ex: He is a persevering, approachable family man.
example.tran: 他是一个不屈不挠、平易近人的居家男人。
